title: Land for Sale in Gampola
details:
7 acres and 12 perches on Gampola / nawalapitiya road - 4 km from Gampola - Athagala

900 Mtrs on a 20 feet road (Tarred road) from main road And facing the 20 feet road

It has tea which brings about 2500 kegs for a month.

Also got 3 buildings -25000 sq ft which have been leased to a poultry farmer for 50000 Rs per month

Has a house with 3 bed Rooms

Also has 90 Agawood trees

Nice view of Hantane range

Solower power 4 kw

Barbed wired right round

Got pipe water as well as spring water

3 phase current

Please call for more information

EXCLUSIVELY SOLD BY -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD , (next to Mahanama college )
COLOMBO 03
